obfuscation: ﻿A smile lit Goro 's black face .
original: ﻿A smile lit Goro's dark face.

obfuscation: He looked down at the elegant dark blue kimono in his arms .
original: He looked down at the elegant dark blue kimono in his arms.

obfuscation: `` It 's beautiful . ''
original: "It's beautiful."

obfuscation: Torren-Wraeth smiled in return , he loved to see Goro smile .
original: Torren-Wraeth smiled in return, he loved to see Goro smile.

obfuscation: `` It belongs to you , Goro-chan . ''
original: "It belongs to you, Goro-chan."

obfuscation: `` But , this is too ... '' `` You deserve it far more than any pampered noble . ''
original: "But, this is too..." "You deserve it far more than any pampered noble."

obfuscation: The dark-skinned youth blushed .
original: The dark-skinned youth blushed.

obfuscation: `` Thank you , Torren-kun ! ''
original: "Thank you, Torren-kun!"

obfuscation: As Goro dressed , Torren-Wraeth looked at his own kimono , bright red and fashionable .
original: As Goro dressed, Torren-Wraeth looked at his own kimono, bright red and fashionable.

obfuscation: He had worried about attracting undue attention with the appearance of wealth , but he decided that he was strong enough to risk any human robber or thief .
original: He had worried about attracting undue attention with the appearance of wealth, but he decided that he was strong enough to risk any human robber or thief.

obfuscation: Besides , this was to be their inaugural trip to the Kabuki theater .
original: Besides, this was to be their first trip to the Kabuki theater.

obfuscation: It had taken enough time and effort to make himself appear human , he might as well show off .
original: It had taken enough time and effort to make himself appear human, he might as well show off.

obfuscation: He looked up at Goro , partly dressed and excitedly pulling himself together .
original: He looked up at Goro, partly dressed and excitedly pulling himself together.

obfuscation: He thought of the men who had abused him , and found a twitch of rage ... Goro must never find out what Torren-Wraeth had done to those men .
original: He thought of the men who had abused him, and felt a twitch of rage... Goro must never find out what Torren-Wraeth had done to those men.

obfuscation: He did not want Goro to ever even hear the name Y'Golonac , a lot less learn what he was , how he dealt with his victims .
original: He did not want Goro to ever even hear the name Y'Golonac, much less learn what he was, how he dealt with his victims.

obfuscation: Torren-Wraeth loathed Y'Golonac , the Defiler , the Obscenity , the obese , headless idol of depravity , who devoured his victims slowly with the mouths in the palms of his flabby , groping hands .
original: Torren-Wraeth loathed Y'Golonac, the Defiler, the Obscenity, the obese, headless god of depravity, who devoured his victims slowly with the mouths in the palms of his flabby, groping hands.

obfuscation: But he had to avenge Goro , he had to make them pay for using him , for torturing him , for robbing him of his childhood and his innocence .
original: But he had to avenge Goro, he had to make them pay for using him, for torturing him, for robbing him of his childhood and his innocence.

obfuscation: merely Y'Golonac could grant the punishment those men deserved ... Then Goro was standing there , smiling , in his blue kimono , and Torren-Wraeth was happy again ... Torren-Wraeth awoke slowly , not wanting to leave his dream , because Goro still lived in his dreams ...
original:
Only Y'Golonac could grant the punishment those men deserved... Then Goro was standing there, smiling, in his blue kimono, and Torren-Wraeth was happy again...
Torren-Wraeth awoke slowly, not wanting to leave his dream, because Goro still lived in his dreams...

obfuscation: He was in China , not Japan , in the Monastery of The Order of The Bloated Woman .
original: He was in China, not Japan, in the Monastery of The Order of The Bloated Woman.

obfuscation: Japan was gone , Goro was gone , and Torren-Wraeth was still here .
original: Japan was gone, Goro was gone, and Torren-Wraeth was still here.

obfuscation: Warm tears ran down his cheeks , but he brushed them aside .
original: Warm tears ran down his cheeks, but he brushed them away.

obfuscation: Life had to go on , and on , and on ... Great Cthulhu was concerned .
original:
Life had to go on, and on, and on...
Great Cthulhu was concerned.

obfuscation: Hastur seemed to have gained some favor in Nyarlathotep 's many eyes , and anything that benefited Hastur weakened Cthulhu , in both their eyes .
original: Hastur seemed to have gained some favor in Nyarlathotep's many eyes, and anything that benefited Hastur weakened Cthulhu, in both their eyes.

obfuscation: `` My Lord Cthulhu , there is no need for concern , '' The tall , red-robed figure that stood at the side of Cthulhu 's throne moved forward respectfully , Chxixsas ' bone-white face seemed to swim within his voluminous gowns , `` It is well known that the fruits of Nyarlathotep 's attentions are rarely to be desired . ''
original: "My Lord Cthulhu, there is no need for concern," The tall, red-robed figure that stood at the side of Cthulhu's throne moved forward respectfully, Chxixsas' bone-white face seemed to swim within his voluminous robes, "It is well known that the fruits of Nyarlathotep's attentions are rarely to be desired."

obfuscation: The voice was thin , hollow , distant , `` This may rise , in fact , a setback for The King in Tatters .
original: The voice was thin, hollow, distant, " This may prove, in fact, a setback for The King in Tatters.

obfuscation: Even nowadays he trembles in his palace at Carcosa , fearing what manner of spawn this union may unleash . ''
original: Even now he trembles in his palace at Carcosa, fearing what manner of spawn this union may unleash."

obfuscation: Cthulhu gave the equivalent of a laugh , `` Can you picture them , The Black Wind knocking down the walls of Carcosa , the Bloody Tongue crushing that cursed palace into dust !
original: Cthulhu gave the equivalent of a laugh, "Can you picture them, The Black Wind knocking down the walls of Carcosa, the Bloody Tongue crushing that cursed palace into dust!

obfuscation: Oh , one can dream , Chxixsas ... One can dream ... '' The two masks , the Golden Angel and the Slender Maiden stood side by side , Is n't it all a lie , in the end ?
original:
Oh, one can dream, Chxixsas... One can dream..."
The two masks, the Golden Angel and the Slender Maiden stood side by side, Isn't it all a lie, in the end?

obfuscation: Torren-Wraeth bowed politely before the Bloated Woman .
original: Torren-Wraeth bowed politely before the Bloated Woman.

obfuscation: She was holding the Black Fan under her eyes , giving the illusion that she was a slender young lady , at least to the humans present .
original: She was holding the Black Fan under her eyes, giving the illusion that she was a slender young lady, at least to the humans present.

obfuscation: holmium Fong stood by reverently , but his jealousy of Tek was as strong as ever .
original: Ho Fong stood by reverently, but his jealousy of Tek was as strong as ever.

obfuscation: Torren-Wraeth wondered if The Bloated Woman would play them against each early ... He hoped not , for both their sake 's .
original: Torren-Wraeth wondered if The Bloated Woman would play them against each other...He hoped not, for both their sake's.

obfuscation: `` It is an honor to again have the presence of the Son of Cthulhu in my humble monastery . ''
original: "It is an honor to again have the presence of the Son of Cthulhu in my humble monastery."

obfuscation: `` The honor is all mine , '' Torren-Wraeth replied lightly , `` My father sends his greetings and good-will toward you , My Lady . ''
original: "The honor is all mine," Torren-Wraeth replied softly, "My father sends his greetings and good-will toward you, My Lady."

obfuscation: The Bloated Woman 's nose-tendril curled delicately in the air , `` No doubt .
original: The Bloated Woman's nose-tendril curled delicately in the air, "No doubt.

obfuscation: Send him my good-will in return . ''
original: Send him my good-will in return."

obfuscation: Torren-Wraeth could n't help but look at the sacrificial altar , where human victims had their arms cut off by the sacred sickles , after which they bled to death .
original: Torren-Wraeth couldn't help but look at the sacrificial altar, where human victims had their arms cut off by the sacred sickles, after which they bled to death.

obfuscation: He shuddered slenderly at the horrible images flashing through his mind .
original: He shuddered slightly at the horrible images flashing through his mind.

obfuscation: The Bloated Woman noted this , but politely made no mention of it .
original: The Bloated Woman noted this, but politely made no mention of it.

obfuscation: Torren-Wraeth honestly could not condemn her , almost all of the worshiped entities , including his own father , demanded human sacrifice , many in even more horrible ways ... `` I regret that I have to leave so soon , though I am grateful for your hospitality . ''
original: Torren-Wraeth honestly could not condemn her, almost all of the worshiped entities, including his own father, demanded human sacrifice, many in even more horrible ways... "I regret that I have to leave so soon, though I am grateful for your hospitality."

obfuscation: The last character , at least , was true .
original: The last part, at least, was true.

obfuscation: `` May The Key and The Gate be with you . ''
original: "May The Key and The Gate be with you."
